author: lulMeow
body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Write a descriptive title.
- [X] Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- [X] Search the existing issues.
- [X] Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- [x] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

Run PowerShell as admin,
type
`Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -online -FeatureName Containers-DisposableClientVM -All -norestart`


p.s it works fine with the preinstalled PowerShell 5.1.25236.1000

found a similar issue here from 2 years ago:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13866

### Expected behavior

```console
Path          :
Online        : True
RestartNeeded : False
```


### Actual behavior

```console
Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature: Class not registered
```


### Error details

```console
PS C:\Windows\System32> get-error

Exception             :
    Type       : System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException
    ErrorCode  : -2147221164
    TargetSite :
        Name          : ThrowTerminatingError
        DeclaringType : System.Management.Automation.MshCommandRuntime, System.Management.Automation,
Version=7.3.0.101, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35
        MemberType    : Method
        Module        : System.Management.Automation.dll
    Message    : Class not registered

    Source     : System.Management.Automation
    HResult    : -2147221164
    StackTrace :
   at System.Management.Automation.MshCommandRuntime.ThrowTerminatingError(ErrorRecord errorRecord)
CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature], COMException
FullyQualifiedErrorId : Microsoft.Dism.Commands.EnableWindowsOptionalFeatureCommand
InvocationInfo        :
    MyCommand        : Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature
    ScriptLineNumber : 1
    OffsetInLine     : 1
    HistoryId        : 1
    Line             : Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -online -FeatureName Containers-DisposableClientVM -All
-norestart
    PositionMessage  : At line:1 char:1
                       + Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -online -FeatureName Containers-Disposa …
                       + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    InvocationName   : Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature
    CommandOrigin    : Internal
ScriptStackTrace      : at <ScriptBlock>, <No file>: line 1

PS C:\Windows\System32
```


### Environment data

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.3.0-rc.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.3.0-rc.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.25236
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0ΓÇª}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```


### Visuals

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72892766/200167574-4645daf5-eebc-42d4-84d5-da18fc90b909.png)

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Are you using the Store installed PS7?

comments.author: lulMeow
comments.body:
> Are you using the Store installed PS7?

Yes, I installed it from Microsoft Store.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Class not registered Error when trying Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature in 7.3.0-rc.1
